problem.markdown:
>>Dissolution of atmospheric carbon dioxide into the oceans causes: << () sea level rise () increased melting of sea ice () fewer hurricanes (x) ocean acidification () sea water expansion
[explanation] Increased atmospheric CO2 can dissolve into the ocean, leading to ocean acidification. [explanation]
problem.p: Dissolution of atmospheric carbon dioxide into the oceans causes:

choicegroup.label: Dissolution of atmospheric carbon dioxide into the oceans causes:

div.p: Increased atmospheric CO2 can dissolve into the ocean, leading to ocean acidification.
